instruction: Compose a tweet featuring a review of a restaurant.
input: I recently visited the Ocean Breeze Cafe, located at the corner of Main Street and 5th Avenue.
output: Just visited the Ocean Breeze Cafe, corner of Main & 5th. Delicious food and lots of great atmosphere. Highly recommend checking it out! #oceanbreezecafe #restaurantreview #foodie  #besteats  #foodreview  #mainstreet
